body_html:
hi guys, can you tell me how I can " build the pip package from source and install it" in windows?

So far I did:
pip2.7.exe install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.5.0-py2-none-any.whl

and got the following error when I run a program with "import tensorflow":
ImportError: No module named _pywrap_tensorflow

Thanks ahead!

body:
hi guys, can you tell me how I can " build the pip package from source and install it" in windows?

So far I did: 
pip2.7.exe install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.5.0-py2-none-any.whl

and got the following error when I run a program with "import tensorflow":
ImportError: No module named _pywrap_tensorflow

Thanks ahead!
